content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions, but I can provide information. 

The use of AI in music creation and composition is still in its early stages, but it has shown a lot of potential. AI-generated music can be used for background music, soundtracks, and video games, and it has also been used to compose complete songs that mimic human-generated music.

While AI-generated music is still in the experimental phase and may not have the same emotional depth and creativity as human-generated music, it could become as popular as human-generated music in certain contexts. For example, music composed by AI could be used to create customized soundscapes for particular listeners, or create music that caters to specific moods or situations.

However, most of the music listeners still want to hear music that is created and performed by humans with their own creativity and artistic expression. Therefore, it is unlikely that AI-generated music will ever completely replace human-generated music. The role of AI in music creation will probably be more focused on assisting musicians in creating their music or producing new sounds, rather than replacing them completely.
